com.att.android.arodatacollector.activities

Class AROCollectorTaskManagerActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • com.att.android.arodatacollector.activities.AROCollectorTaskManagerActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class AROCollectorTaskManagerActivity
extends android.app.Activity
    Represents the Task Killer screen of the ARO Data Collector, which lists all of the running processes and provides an option to select and cancel those processes.

    • Field Summary

      A string for logging ARO Data Collector task killer activity in an Android log.
